title: Unknown Anouncement During Game
body: During my last game towards the end, there was a chat response (in the same color and fashion of a direct message) that said "unknown announcement" and something of the sort referring to" kill worm." I tried to bring up the chat log afterwards in replay mode(not doable obviously). I had never seen such a message before. I am looking for clarification and explanation.

replies.body: Iiiinteresting. A player may have been using the little known /me feature in chat, which can make it look like some kind of emote. I'm rather sure we haven't made any in game announcements referring to "killing a worm".
I just had this exact same line pop up. Was I hacked?

Hi i just came out a game where i have seen a similar Game Announcement message 

this is the message:
game announcement OnKillWorm Unknown chat

Took a pic of it link below:
https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B429jrbXpydnSW04SzE1aGVYMTQ

I also want to know what the heck this is. thank you

Ive attempted to use this /me command and to also research it. Both have brought me no closer to discovering the origin of this message like notification. So a little more explain would be greatly appreciated. Also, if you were able to access the chat from that day, that would be much more helpful. Thank you.
